game.name: Fluttershy Pony Dress Up
game.description:
Get ready to dive into the unlimited funny and exciting gameplay by joining our brand new dressing game for girls where you will have full control on everything you do on the screen! You will meet today with a little pony and the cute equestria girl who needs your advice to change their outfits. Do you think that your fashion abilities could help them to sort out this puzzle? Join Fluttershy Pony Dress Up game and be prepared to challenge your fashion sense in a unique style!

This cartoon inspired free online girls game features a cute and little pony who is your good friend. Your objective is to dress her up by making changes in her skin color, hair and tails. Do not forget to help Equestria girl to pick some beautiful outfits along with the needful accessories! She is very trendy and follows the current fashion trend, so do your best to help the girl choose the perfect style and make her look fabulous today. 

Use the mouse to browse and click all the times you see on the screen and pick up the one that can make Fluttershy look extremely gorgeous and happy in this dress up simulation game! We cover countless girls games where you can practice both your fashion and makeover abilities for free. Stay connected with atmegame.com to spot new dressing mobile game and have fun wherever you go, no download required!
